content:
stateDiagram
[*] --> "Main Phone List Page"
  Note "User sees available phones"
  "Request Phone Swap" button -->
"Modal Pop-up"
[*] --> "Phone to Request" dropdown
  Note "Select a phone from the list"
"Phone to Exchange" dropdown -->
  Note "Only shows phones currently owned by the user"
"Reason for Request (Optional)" text area -->
  Note "Enter additional comments"
"Actions: Submit Request and Cancel buttons"
[*] --> "Submit Request"
  Note "Validate form submission and store request in database"
[*] --> "Cancel"
  Note "Close modal pop-up and return to main phone list page"
"Confirmation Message"
[*] --> "Request submitted successfully"
  Note "Show confirmation message after successful submission"
"Pending Status" -->
  Note "Default status for new requests"

attempts.content:
Based on the provided requirements and project context, I'm excited to generate a Mermaid State diagram representing the Phone Swap Request Feature.

Here's the diagram:

```mermaid
stateDiagram
[*] --> "Main Phone List Page"
  Note "User sees available phones"
  "Request Phone Swap" button -->

"Modal Pop-up"
[*] --> "Phone to Request" dropdown
  Note "Select a phone from the list"

"Phone to Exchange" dropdown -->
  Note "Only shows phones currently owned by the user"

"Reason for Request (Optional)" text area -->
  Note "Enter additional comments"

"Actions: Submit Request and Cancel buttons"
[*] --> "Submit Request"
  Note "Validate form submission and store request in database"
[*] --> "Cancel"
  Note "Close modal pop-up and return to main phone list page"

"Confirmation Message"
[*] --> "Request submitted successfully"
  Note "Show confirmation message after successful submission"

"Pending Status" -->
  Note "Default status for new requests"
```

This Mermaid State diagram illustrates the Phone Swap Request Feature, including:

1. The Main Phone List Page with a "Request Phone Swap" button.
2. The Modal Pop-up that appears when the user clicks the button.
3. The form fields within the modal:
	* "Phone to Request" dropdown list
	* "Phone to Exchange" dropdown list showing only the user's owned phones
	* "Reason for Request (Optional)" text area
	* Actions: "Submit Request" and "Cancel" buttons
4. The Confirmation Message displayed after successful submission.

This diagram should provide a clear visual representation of the feature, helping stakeholders and developers understand the flow and interactions involved in the Phone Swap Request Feature.
